contentrichtext.text: {{notability|date=September 2011}} {{one source|date=September 2011}} The '''Association des Bibliophiles Universels''' ('''ABU'''; in English "The Association of Universal Booklovers") is a [[French language]] organization dedicated to producing [[e-text]] versions of [[public domain]] French texts. It was founded in April 1993, and has members from [[Belgium]], [[Canada]], [[France]], [[Portugal]], [[Switzerland]] and the [[United States|USA]]. ==See also== *[[Digital library]] *[[Elibrary]] *[[Project Gutenberg]] *[[List of digital library projects]] ==External links== *[http://abu.cnam.fr/ ABU: la BibliothÃ¨que Universelle] (The Universal Library - in French) {{DEFAULTSORT:Association Des Bibliophiles Universels}} [[Category:Organizations based in France]] [[Category:Language-oriented digital libraries]] {{library-stub}}
